about_the_game:
Dungeons Bomb is an arcade-style game that supports 1 to 4 players to play together to challenge the high score or enjoy the battle modes

  • CHALLENGE MODE

    Single player or play with your friends together to challenge the high score

  • VERSUS MODE - DEATHMATCH

    Battle with your friends until time runs out.

  • VERSUS MODE - BATTLE ROYALE

    Fight with your friends until you are the last one standing.

  • VERSUS MODE - HUNT CHALLENGE

    Monster hunting competition, whoever kills the most monsters will be the winner.
